official_title: A bill to eliminate the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to construct and administer scenic roads as a part of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore, Michigan, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Eliminates the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to construct and administer scenic roads as part of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore in Michigan.
